author: bridge-bot
content:
<minhhn2910> Thanks :) 
When I try to run `nix profile install github:ethereum/hevm`.  I always get the err msg below. I tried both on ubuntu & NixOs 
```
error: builder for '/nix/store/azhxxmjq083wpw82b6pc290vs86lwai5-hevm-0.50.0.drv' failed with exit code 1;
       last 10 log lines:
       >     eq-sol-exp-cex:                                  Equivalence checking 11 combinations
       > OK (0.09s)
       >     eq-all-yul-optimization-tests:                   FAIL
       >       Exception: solidity/test/libyul/yulOptimizerTests: getDirectoryContents:openDirStream: does not exist (No such file or directory)
       >       Use -p '/eq-all-yul-optimization-tests/' to rerun this test only.
       >
       > 1 out of 137 tests failed (434.31s)
       > Test suite test: FAIL
       > Test suite logged to: dist/test/hevm-0.50.0-test.log
       > 0 of 1 test suites (0 of 1 test cases) passed.
```

author: bridge-bot
content: <minhhn2910> I resolved it by running make directly in src/hevm and not using the command in Readme. Is it only me having this or it's a bug needs openning issue

author: bridge-bot
content: <minhhn2910> Also, I wonder why we dont have prebuilt binaries for releases? it's easier for me as a user try to test, I only need binary file.

author: bridge-bot
content: <minhhn2910> I'm new to this btw, thanks :)

author: bridge-bot
content: <minhhn2910> One more question, is there any alternatives similar to hevm? I'm interested in the `--get-models` option where you give example input for each path.

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> yeah totally, we have static binaries for linux set up, we just need to hook them up to the release pipeline

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> we still need to do a bit more work to get static binaries in ci for macos

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> we definitely want to do it though

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> I think kevm would be the other open source symbolic execution engine for evm

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> I'm not sure how to use it to generate test cases though

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> we still have a bit of work to do on the counterexample generation for `--get-models`. Right now we don't produce models for storage, and some of the calldata counterexamples aren't representable. Longer term we would ideally just produce a foundry test contract that exercises every branch in the input contract

author: bridge-bot
content: <minhhn2910> thanks for the pointers, I will read more and ask question after I understand more about this.

author: bridge-bot
content: <xvwx:matrix.dapp.org.uk> v happy to answer all questions :)
